svg:
Library Management System - PHP & PostgreSQL
Component Diagram
Presentation Layer
Web Interface HTML/CSS/JS
Mobile App React Native
Admin Panel PHP/HTML
API Gateway Nginx/Apache
Business Logic Layer (PHP)
Authentication Service JWT/Session
Book Management Service CRUD Operations
Loan Management Service Borrow/Return
Notification Service Email/SMS
Reporting Service Analytics
Data Access Layer
Database Abstraction
ORM Layer Eloquent/PDO
Connection Pool
Cache Layer Redis/Memcached
PostgreSQL Database Books, Members, Loans, Users
Deployment Diagram
Client Devices
Web Browser Chrome/Firefox
Mobile iOS/Android
Internet/Network
Load Balancer
Nginx/HAProxy Port 80/443
Web Server Cluster
Web Server 1 Apache/Nginx PHP 8.2 Ubuntu 22.04 4GB RAM Port 80
Web Server 2 Apache/Nginx PHP 8.2 Ubuntu 22.04 4GB RAM Port 80
App Server PHP-FPM Business Logic 8GB RAM Port 9000
Database Server
PostgreSQL Master Version 15.x Port 5432
PostgreSQL Slave Read Replica Port 5432
Cache
Redis Session Store Port 6379
Memcached Data Cache Port 11211
Technical Specifications
PHP Server Configuration
